3.1.name: wordpress/meemi-in-wordpress
3.1.description:
Meemi in Wordpress can:

  • Widget: Display your meme on sidebar of your blog
  • Meemi Post: Send your blog's post and updates to Meemi
  • Meemi Comment: Display post's comments (on Meemi) on post's page (require Meemi Post)
  • Meemi Content: Put meme in your blog's post with a Shortcode like: [meemi_content url="URL OF MEME"]

Meemi in Wordpress is very configurable.

Meemi Comment have two CSS file (white, black) in the directory's plugin to display the output. Obviously, no one can adapt to all circumstances, but it is a starting point.

If you make CSS customizations or translations please share them :)

For Info & support visit: http://vincenzodibiaggio.net/tech/meemi-in-wordpress/ For addon and more made by MeemiInWordpress's users vistit: ht
